attributes.additional_details:
Millions of people died in the last World war to liberate Europe and allow each nation freedom from domination of one country, they did not die for a United States of Europe (USE).  The Eurozone is in crisis and now Germany and France are proposing financial governance of the Eurozone from Brussels which is only a short step away from fiscal union and only then requires one small further step to USE.  Before this final step is reached the UK will begin to feel pressure to be included.

To make the feelings of the people known to the Government a referendum should be held now on the simple question “do you want the UK to be part of further EU integration?”
